name: cAR Show
description:
Open cAR Show.
Use it.
Keep your jaw from dropping! ;)
cAR Show brings the cars you've ever dreamed of right in front to you! Configure them with your favourite color, place them in your garage, take a picture and share with your friends: they won't believe their eyes!
Here are the major features:
-AR Kit: thanks to the integration of AR Kit you can bring into real world the car of your dreams, place it, configure it and take awesome pictures.
-Incredible photorealism: the car really reflects what stands around it, lights adapts to the real scene for a PERFECT blending. Most people doesn't even realize it comes from your device!
-Filters, filters and filters: you can customize your picture with 25 built-in filters before you share with your friends.
-Premium features: you can unlock ALL the amazing features of cAR Show with an in-App purchase. This will bring 11 more cars, the chance to disable/enable car plate and picture watermarks...
Get now cAR Show, be amazed!
